title: Valerie
description: “To be fair, everyone was already dead when I got there.”When Valerie wakes in purgatory and is confronted by the valkyries, powerful beings assigned to safeguard the light, she can’t remember who she is. Even so, she’s certain she isn’t the traitor they all think.None seem more suspicious of her than the callous Jaemin, whose cruel treatment thrusts Valerie onto a desperate mission to clear her name and win back the trust of those she double-crossed. But Valerie’s quest for the truth leads her to discover something sinister—each of the light’s guardians hides a dark secret of their own.Valerie is Episode 1 of Brittni Chenelle’s Serialized Eleven Wings Series—definitive proof that little books can host colossal stories. This is only 1 out of 6 episodes, meant to be binged. It is not novel-length. Expect cliffhangers!
author: Brittni Chenelle
